headline: Show HN: Open sourcing my Web3 bookmarks that I use everyday
description:
I've over 200+ Web3 resources bookmarked ...now making it open-source so that it helps web3 enthaustic

Here you'll find:

  Courses  Tools  Books   Videos  Job Board  News Letters
It's free.

PS: Make sure to bookmark & keep contributing

https://heynikhila.gumroad.com/l/awesome-web3-resource
